# The `InstructionMapping` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper class that represents how the value of an instruction may be mapped and what is the related cost of such mapping. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::RegisterBankInfo::InstructionMapping</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Helper class that represents how the value of an instruction may be mapped and what is the related cost of such mapping.

Definition at line 191 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### InstructionMapping() {#abe3358173059c094cd0ec5ca3cb4e07e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::RegisterBankInfo::InstructionMapping::InstructionMapping (unsigned ID, unsigned Cost, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">ValueMapping</a> &#42; OperandsMapping, unsigned NumOperands)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Constructor for the mapping of an instruction.

<code>NumOperands</code> must be equal to number of all the operands of the related instruction. The rationale is that it is more efficient for the optimizers to be able to assume that the mapping of the ith operand is at the index i.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h/#l00218">218</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InstructionMapping() {#a58a261e5cc9ae03a1bed35f56c973447}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="llvm::RegisterBankInfo::InstructionMapping::InstructionMapping ()"
  labels = {["default"]}>
Default constructor.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this constructor to express that the mapping is invalid.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h/#l00226">226</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### setOperandsMapping() {#aa6d3eca1020d06782fb82e377c6991c9}

<MemberDefinition

Set the mapping for all the operands.

In other words, OpdsMapping should hold at least getNumOperands <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">ValueMapping</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h/#l00249">249</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>.

### verify() {#a89e479535d719fb4ec8904104ec1e8ae}

<MemberDefinition

<SectionUser title="Precondition">

</SectionUser>

This method does not check anything when assertions are disabled.
:::


<SectionUser title="Returns">

</SectionUser>

### ID {#a2140e0835c80d314a8d943c1a17fb17f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::RegisterBankInfo::InstructionMapping::ID = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#aabde40ed6dff50ce0fc5922ce428c79d">InvalidMappingID</a></>}>
Identifier of the mapping.

This is used to communicate between the target and the optimizers which mapping should be realized.
